body.p:
Terre Haute Inda
Nov 5" 1860
His Excellency,
Beriah MaGoffin
Dear Sir

I write you at the request of Geo.. W. Thompson of Rockville Inda who wishes an appointment from you as Commissioner to take the acknowledgment of Deeds &c for the state of Kentucky. Mr Thompson is a most Excellent gentleman, clerk of the circuit Court of his County, and is a brother of the Hon R W Thompson of this city. His term of office as clerk is about to Expire and I believe he wishes to go into the law and Real Estate Business.

I desire to obtain this appointment for him and will Esteem your attention to it as a personal favor to myself. Your secretary of state will please indicate his fee on the Commission or otherwise
and it will be forwarded immediately.
I avail myself of this oportunity to Express the pleasure with which I call to mind our brief acquaintance of four years ago, and to assure you of my highest regard.

Very truly
Your Obt Servt
D. W. Voorhees

Indiana
Comr of Deeds
Geo. W. Thompson
Rockville
Com Issd Nov. 8. 1860
